Mayor Pro Tem Winfred Frazier - Position 1
==========================================

Winfred C. Frazier was elected to the Bellaire City Council in November 2021.  He was elected as Mayor Pro Tempore in January 2022.

Winfred C. Frazier is an Attorney with The Law Firm of Paris and Associates.   Winfred is a retired Vice President with ABC-TV/Walt Disney Corporation.

Winfred graduated from the Bellaire Citizens Academy and the Bellaire Police Academy. He is a current member of the Bellaire/Southwest Houston Rotary Club and the Bellaire Business Association. He received the Houston Television Lifetime Achievement Award and the African American Pioneer in Houston Media.

Winfred holds a bachelor’s degree in Business Administration from Texas Southern University, and a J.D. Degree from South Texas College of Law.

Winfred and his wife, Dr. Johnnie P. Frazier, have two adult children – Dr. Denise T. Frazier, and Dr. Winfred T. Frazier.

### Current Term

January 3, 2022 - January 5, 2026
